name: International Conference on Physical Medicine And Rehabilitation
content: Frigate Conferences cordially invites you to the “International Conference on Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation” (ICPMR 2024) which is scheduled in Dubai, UAE during September 16-18, 2024\. The summit will highlight the theme “Analyzing Advancements and Progress in the Field of Physical Medicine Research and Rehabilitation Therapies”. ICPMR-2024 serves as a global platform for physiotherapists to convene and exchange insights on education, research, and clinical practices. Notably, advancements in biomedicine and assistive technology for individuals with disabilities represent some of the most noteworthy breakthroughs. The ICPMR-2024 conference seeks to facilitate dialogues surrounding crucial professional topics in the realm of physical medicine and rehabilitation. The conference will delve into practical implementations and interventions that are supported by evidence, through plenary talks, keynote sessions, and oral and poster presentations. These activities aim to highlight the importance of effective communication, collaboration, and interdisciplinary teamwork in the provision of rehabilitation services. Furthermore, the conference will place significant emphasis on incorporating the patient's perspective into the scientific program, recognizing its vital role in shaping the field. Your active participation in these events will be instrumental in influencing the future direction of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation. We look forward in seeing in Dubai, UAE!!
